author: oshadura
body:
### PR description:
Add missing includes for CondFormats libraries and remove override identifier for non-virtual functions. 

CC: @davidlange6 @vgvassilev   

Tested locally with CXXMODULES IBs and these fixes had been allowed to enable 29 modules (https://github.com/cms-sw/cmsdist/pull/5600).
title: Add missing includes  and remove override id identifier for non-virtual functions for CondFormats
